{"step_by_step_thinking": "After removal of periodontal dressing, the goal is to minimize sensitivity. Sensitivity can occur due to exposed dentin or irritation of the gums. To keep sensitivity to a minimum, it is important to maintain good oral hygiene and keep the roots plaque-free. Plaque buildup can irritate the gums and contribute to sensitivity. Therefore, the correct answer is C. Keep roots, plaque free.", "answer_choice": "C"}
